name: Super Star Violet
description:
First person shooter game where the player's skill will be the key to not only complete the levels but to pass them in the shortest possible time. The weapons, apart from killing the enemies, will help the player to pass the level.

Main objectives:

  • The player starts at point A and must reach point B in the shortest possible time.
  • It is necessary to kill all the enemies of the level in order to complete the level.
  • Player's essential skills:
    • Aim precisely
    • Clever use of your skills
    • Clever use of your weapons
